description: The scene depicts two individuals examining an ancient mummy within an open coffin. One figure uses a flashlight, from which a speech bubble emanates stating "NO PRESERVATIVES ADDED." This specific detail creates an ironic and absurd situation by applying modern consumer product labeling concepts to a historical artifact. The novel environment of a tomb and the surreal detail of the talking flashlight beam emphasize the unexpected nature of the discovery. The juxtaposition highlights the contrast between ancient preservation methods and contemporary marketing.
